content.question: After reading the scenario, respond to Parts A, B, and C below. Describe the role of Congress in the context of the scenario. In the context of the scenario, explain how the role of Congress described in Part A may affect state priorities. Explain how the type of grant used to fund the proposal could affect the scenario.

topic.text: 2.1: Congress: The Senate and the House of Representatives

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
